actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights

official_title: To authorize the acceptance of endowment contributions for educational and cultural international exchange programs of the Department of State and the designation of such programs in recognition of the contributions.

summary.text: Amends the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 to authorize the Secretary of State to: (1) accept endowment contributions for educational and cultural international exchange programs of the Department of State; and (2) designate such programs in recognition of the endowment contributions if such programs have not been designated by law.

titles.title: To authorize the acceptance of endowment contributions for educational and cultural international exchange programs of the Department of State and the designation of such programs in recognition of the contributions.
